frame

Class GamePanel.MuteButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • frame.GamePanel.Button
      • frame.GamePanel.MuteButton
  • Enclosing class:
    GamePanel

    private class GamePanel.MuteButton
extends GamePanel.Button
    MuteButton is a special GamePanel.Button that is instantiated once in GamePanel, which allows the user to turn music on and off.
    Version:
    2.0.0.0
    Author:
    Lev Raizman

    • Field Summary

      private boolean on
      The state of the button.

    • Field Detail

      • on

        private boolean on
        The state of the button. On is for music being on, off is for music being off.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MuteButton

        public MuteButton()
        Constructs a MuteButton. Needs no parameters because it's only made once.
